action: I want to accurately manage contract information, expiration dates, and renewal conditions with business partners
reason: To prevent contract lapses, missed automatic renewals, and legal risks
acceptance_criteria: Contract registration is only executable by authenticated users.
Only roles with contract operation permissions can create or update records.
Contract IDs are automatically numbered and unique.
Partner IDs are linked to the existing partner master data.
Registration is not possible with a non-existent partner ID.
Contract types (Outsourcing, NDA, Sales, etc.) can be maintained.
Contract start and end dates are mandatory inputs.
Registration fails if the start date is after the end date.
An automatic renewal flag can be maintained.
A renewal notification schedule is generated when automatic renewal is enabled.
Contract files (PDF, etc.) can be uploaded.
A maximum file size limit is configured.
Dangerous file formats are rejected.
Files are stored in encrypted storage.
The contract amount field is in numeric format.
Currency units can be maintained.
Contract status (Active / Terminated / Suspended) is managed.
Expired contracts can automatically transition to 'Terminated' status.
Contract renewal history is saved.
Change history includes values before and after the change.
The operating user ID and timestamp are included in the update history.
Concurrent update conflicts are detected (optimistic locking).
Updates fail if the version does not match.
SQL injection countermeasures are implemented (parameterized queries).
XSS countermeasures are implemented (input sanitization).
Registration and update processes are completed within a DB transaction.
Rollback is performed upon partial failure.
A notification event is issued 30 days before the contract expiration.
Notifications are processed via an asynchronous queue.
Contract data can be logically deleted.
Deletion is only possible by administrators.
Audit logs are saved upon deletion.
The same validation applies to operations via API.
Internal DB information is not included in the response.
HTTPS communication is mandatory.
Rate limiting is applied.
API versioning is managed.
Complies with REST API standards.
User-facing messages and internal logs are separated upon error.
Audit logs are stored in tamper-evident storage.
A contract list search function is available.
Filtering by partner, date range, and status is possible.
Sorting by contract expiration date is possible.
Reports of contracts due for renewal can be generated.
A CSV export function is available.
Personal information masking settings are possible during CSV output.
Contract data character encoding is unified in UTF-8.
Target API response time is within 300ms.
